scripts.lint: prettier --check 'src/**/*.{js,ts,json,svg}' && echo 'Running ESLint...' && eslint src --report-unused-disable-directives --max-warnings 0 && echo 'All files pass linting!' && echo 'Running tsc...' && sed -i.bak '/setCookie(/d' ../../node_modules/@types/request/index.d.ts && tsc && echo 'All files pass type checking!'
scripts.build: npm run clean && sed -i.bak '/setCookie(/d' ../../node_modules/@types/request/index.d.ts && tsc && vite build
